value.title: Get feedback from your Power BI report users!
value.excerpt: What if you could find out what your users want directly from your Power BI Reports? What if users could submit bugs and feedback for your report? Adam shows you a way to do it!  Connect with Chris: https://twitter.com/ChrisHamill17  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************
